title: My League Of Legends Crashes In-Game
body:
I've been getting a lot of league crashing for  while now, giving me bans for me to put up with.
but, I know I'm not good at fixing things but i need this to be fixed.
So the crashes seem to "activate" when i join or leave a huge group fight, because I can at least play league near the start of the game, the crash seems to play the last sound in repeat, then completely freezes me computer, then crashing it.
and also, I've factory reset my computer and still happened, so i don't think it could be a virus or something.
But I've heard something about graphics card or some crapp. so could it be that?

CAN I HAVE HELP PLEASE! D: I CANT PLAY LEAGUE

{{item:3151}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like your GPU may be overheating or your drivers crashing and your system being unable to recover.

Let's first rule out any issue with your drivers, have you recently updated your graphics card drivers? If not, please do this.

* Does the issue still persist?
* Do you experience this issue in any other games that may be considered "Graphically Intense"?
